pages.text: One of the most infamous of all demons, Baphomet posses the head and legs of a goat, a feminine form, and pair of large corvid wings upon their back. Baphomet also wears a burning torch upon their head, the flame of eldritch knowledge.

Often associated with alchemists, and of fallen templars, Baphomet is known to bless those worthy with infernal knowledge, even if the mind of the recipient cannot comprehend it. Baphomet can also exert control over lower demons, and can usually bless their Summoner with the powers of a demon themselves,

pages.title: Pledging
pages.text: Given the player prove him/herself to the old Goat by ingesting a Stew of the Grotesque while wearing a full set of any witch robes, and while holding a Pentacle.
